info.short_description: For progressives, leftists, socialists, anarchists, Marxists, environmentalists, vegans, anti-fascists, LGBTQ+, human rights activists, etc.
info.full_description:
[en] Todon.nl is a Mastodon instance for progressives, leftists, socialists, anarchists, Marxists, (left-wing) activists, environmentalists, vegans, anti-racists, anti-fascists, anti-capitalists, pirates, LGBTQ+, human rights activists, etc. Please join us!

[nl] Todon.nl is een Mastodonserver voor progressievelingen, linkse mensen, socialisten, anarchisten, Marxisten, (linkse) activisten, milieubewuste mensen, vegans, antiracisten, antifascisten, antikapitalisten, piraten, LGBTQ+, mensenrechtenactivisten, enz. Meld je aan!

info.short_description: Mastodon.at is a public Mastodon instance and federates with most instances in the Fediverse. Online since April 2017.
info.full_description:
Mastodon.at is a public Mastodon instance that's been running since April of 2017. We federate with other instances unless their community values are overwhelmingly incompatible with our Terms of Service. Our primary languages are English and German, but other languages are more than welcome.

Mastodon.at is maintained by an experienced sysadmin. User data is backed up to multiple locations at least once every hour to avoid data loss. We are hosted in France, with an additional server location in SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil.

info.short_description:
mastodonten.de ist eine Mastodon Instanz offen fÃ¼r alle netten Leute. :-)
mastodonten.de is a Mastodon instance open to nice people
info.full_description:
Da "Geht gut miteinander um" einfach gesagt als getan ist, haben wir eine (nicht vollstÃ¤ndige) Liste von Verhaltensweisen aufgestellt, die zu einer LÃ¶schung von Toots und zu einer Blockung von Accounts fÃ¼hren kÃ¶nnen, wenn die Probleme fortbestehen. Insbesondere tolerieren wir nicht:


- BelÃ¤stigung, Stalking, Doxxing
- Rassismus, Sexismus, Beschimpfungen oder deren BefÃ¼rwortung
- Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten oder deren BefÃ¼rwortung
- GewalttÃ¤tige nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder FÃ¶rderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus
- Leute kontaktieren, die klar gemacht haben, dass sie keinen Kontakt wollen. Dogpiling
- Nicht markierter sexueller Inhalt, Gewaltdarstellungen oder Werbung
- Nicht getaggte oder automatisierte oder Ã¼bermÃ¤ÃŸige Werbung
- Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren

Bitte melden Sie Verhalten, das Sie stÃ¶rt. Das schlieÃŸt Verhalten von anderen Instanzen mit ein - wir sind sehr gerne bereit, mit Asshole-Instanzen die Verbindung zu unterbrechen.

Basierend auf dem "About" von chaos.social verfÃ¼gbar in deren Github-Repository.


Since "Be excellent to each other" is much easier said than done, we have a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviours that may lead to deletion of toots, and silencing or suspension of accounts, if problems persist. In particular, we do not tolerate:

- Harrassment, stalking, doxxing

- Racism, sexism, verbal abuse or advocation thereof

- Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

- Violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism

- Contacting people who made clear they want no contact. Dogpiling/brigading

- Untagged sexual content, gore, or advertisement

- Untagged, or automated, or excessive advertisement

- Bots interacting with users without their explicit requests


Please report behaviour that bothers you. That includes behaviour from other instances - we are very willing stop federating with asshole instances.


(Based on the about of chaos.social)

info.short_description: soc.ialis.me is a generalist and leftist instance runt by a collective
info.full_description:
Our guidelines are currently being written ; but basically:

* Don't be a dick,
* No advertising, harassment, spam,
* No abuse on the API by local users (bots, ...),
* Any thing illegal under the French law will be removed and reported to the competent authorities.

Informations and status about the instance is posted to @admin. We are 8 forming a administration council ;  @b9AcE @href @jd @wxl @marxistvegan @stephanmaus @Famine @hecate.

Don't hesitate to ping either one of the list or @admin to talk about the instance, create an issue at ialisme/soc.ialis.me on GitHub, or privately at admin (at) soc.ialis.me.

The instance itself is hosted on servers at Online.net and Scaleway.com, in Paris, France. The database and files are frequently replicated on a couple of servers, and externally backuped.

info.short_description: Welcome to the 8th Layer of Madness. Every human is welcome. Topics are mostly Linux, Anime, Music, Software, ...
info.full_description: "Don't be a dick", and really don't push it
We are an international instance with no particular focus on any specific theme, a short and memorable domain, and a lightly moderated friendly community.

info.short_description: A Mastodon instance for Metal music fans. Hosted in Germany with 100% green energy.
info.full_description: A Mastodon instance for Metal music fans. This Mastodon instance addresses Metal music fans, but can be used by other users as well :-)

info.short_description: Hosted with love in Germany. Server runs with 100% clean energy. Feel free to join!
info.full_description: Hosted with love in Germany. Server runs with 100% clean energy. Feel free to join!

info.short_description: ieji.de is useable via .onion, fast and well secured plus ES and CDN!
info.full_description:
ieji.de is powered by a powerful dedicated server, has a good 1Gbps DE-CIX uplink, DDoS protection, best possible TLS settings without locking too much out(like Android) and a Tor onion link if you need a bit anonymity.

We are a liberal instance based in Frankfurt. Blocking other instances only on really harsh misbehaviour. And instance whitelisting is a no go.

Feel free to join, you can always delete your account.

Elasticsearch is enabled

Minio CDN is enabled

info.short_description: And instance for tech-lovers and small-business founders of the Ruhr area in Germany
info.full_description:
Welcome to Ruhr.Social, your mastodon instance for everything regarding the Ruhr area in Germany. We want to be a platform for tech-lovers, nerds and founders of small businesses and provide an ad-free and social place to talk for you.

Have fun :)

This instance is made possible by the awesome people at 9elements
info.topic: An instance for the Ruhr area in Germany

info.short_description: Run by your friendly neighbourhood hackspace from Weimar, Germany.
info.full_description:
We believe in cyberanarchism. And just like any good old-fashioned anarchist collective, we look out for each other.
We aim to be kind of local-ish, but we're still open to anyone who thinks they fit in here. :)

A frank community for female pleasure â€” recreational and educational

Welcome to Inanna! Inanna wants to help women get better sexual experiences - orgasming each time is a high bar, but making it enjoyable each time is entirely possible.

How to use this site? If you are a woman: write down and share your most mind-blowing experiences; be inspired by other women and discover new territories; mark the toots you like via "Boost" and share your username with your partner ;)

If you are a man: read and learn (you are welcome); join the discussion by asking a question, sharing your experiences; be humble and open-minded.

Why create Inanna? Female sexual pleasure deserves far more attention than it currently does - not only by men, but also by women themselves. Inanna is not for dating or hookups. However, you are encouraged to use Inanna to find out what your partner likes ğŸ˜ We are fully aware of the sensitivity here, hence we chose Mastodon to ensure anonymity and no secret data abuse. So, feel safe to speak up.

info.short_description: Bonn.social ist eine Mastodon-Instanz fÃ¼r Bonn und alle, die Bonn lieben. Thema kann Bonn sein, muss es aber nicht.

info.short_description: mastodon.freifunk-muensterland.de ist eine Mastodon Instanz von Freifunkern fÃ¼r Freifunker, Freifunk-Interessierte und andere nette Menschen.
info.full_description:
mastodon.freifunk-muensterland.de ist eine Mastodon Instanz von Freifunkern fÃ¼r Freifunker, Freifunk-Communities, Freifunk-Interessierte und andere nette Menschen.

Unsere Regeln und alles weitere findet ihr unter https://mastodon.freifunk-muensterland.de/about/more

info.short_description: A small instance in Germany with no specific topic.
info.full_description:
A small instance with the aim to connect people to the fediverse, especially those who are switching from e.g. twitter to Mastodon. We provide a generalistic instance for everybody to join.

For people who are used to Twitter's look and feel, we provide a Halcyon-Instance to make the transition even more fun and seamlessly.
Le serveur est hÃ©bergÃ© en Alsace, on dÃ©marre doucement :)

info.short_description:
Erste Mastodon Instanz in MÃ¼nchen (Bayern) fÃ¼r MÃ¼nchnerinnen, MÃ¼nchner und alle "Zuagroasten".
First Mastodon Instance in Munich (Bavaria, Germany).
info.full_description:
German: Erste Mastodon Instanz fÃ¼r MÃ¼nchnerinnen, MÃ¼nchner und alle "Zuagroasten" ;) Hier ist jeder Willkommen. Ich mÃ¶chte Euch mit frei.social eine sichere Anlaufstelle bieten, um unbeschwert zu trÃ¶ten und dass Ihr Mastodon bequem und einfach nutzen kÃ¶nnt. Die Server fÃ¼r frei.social stehen in Deutschland und Euere Daten werden nicht weiterverwertet. NatÃ¼rlich ist die Verbindung zu den Servern verschlÃ¼sselt und es werden tÃ¤glich angelegt. So wie es sich gehÃ¶rt. 
Ich wÃ¼nsche Euch viel Spass mit frei.social und wenn Ihr Lust habt, trÃ¶tet mich einfach mal an :)

English: First munich mastodon instance. I would like to provide you with a secure place with frei.social. There is no special topic here, I just want to give you the opportunity that you can use Mastodon convenient and easy and you know where your data is. The servers for frei.social are located in Germany.
Have Fun, and if you like, send me a toot :)

info.short_description: Freie unabhÃ¤ngige Fediverse Instanz fÃ¼r jedermann. Kernthemen: Gaming, Streaming, Technik und FÃ¶deration
info.full_description:
Willkommen auf der Mastodon Instanz von Anoxinon.de!

Wir sind ein Gemeinschaftsprojekt welches zum Ziel hat Ressourcen (ob Human oder Wirtschaftlich) zu bÃ¼ndeln um gemeinsame Projekte zu verwirklichen. 

Die Kernthemen unserer Instanz drehen sich um: Gaming, Streaming, Technik und FÃ¶deration. Jedoch wird hier natÃ¼rlich jede andere Person auch gerne gesehen. 

Mastodon ist eine dezentralisierte alternative zu Sozialen Netzwerken wie Twitter und bietet dir die MÃ¶glichkeit dich ohne Zensur und EinschrÃ¤nkungen frei zu Ã¤uÃŸern.
